title: Product Satisfaction Survey
description: To better understand the needs and find improvement points.

content.question: Overall how satisfied are you with the product?
content.suggestions: Very Satisfied, A bit Satisfied, Neutral, Dissatisfied, Very Dissastisfied

title: Vacation Travel Survey
description: To understand traveller's behaviors and preferences.

content.question: Where do you go most often?
content.suggestions: Hill Stations, Beaches, Deserts, Historically Significant Places, Commercially Busy Cities
